title: Reports
---

```{r}
#| label: load
targets::tar_load(
  c(
    rbcl,
    rbcl_dist,
    trnlf_dist),
  store = here::here("_targets/"))

source(here::here("R/packages.R"))
```

There are `r length(rbcl)` rbcL sequences.

```{r}
rbcl_dist %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = dist, fill = comp_type)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(comp_type), nrow = 2, ncol = 1, scales = "free_y")
```

```{r}
trnlf_dist %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = dist, fill = comp_type)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(comp_type), nrow = 2, ncol = 1, scales = "free_y")
```
